value.name: Teen shot dead after aiming toy gun at Maryland State Police trooper
value.description: “The trooper fired at the male, wounding him,” Jones said. The teen, who was identified as Peyton Ham, 16, and who lived a few houses away, then pulled a knife, Jones said. “The trooper ...

value.name: ‘Hardly enough training’: Teen killed by police in Kansas City suburb had BB gun
value.description: Days after Grandview police fatally shot a teenager in crisis, Jackson County prosecutors said the teen was holding a BB gun when he was killed. Grandview police have said the officers had crisis ...
